verses.plain: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

tokens.t: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

verses.plain: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

tokens.t: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

verses.plain: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

tokens.t: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

verses.plain: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

tokens.t: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

verses.plain: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

tokens.t: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

verses.plain: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

tokens.t: Therefore let us not sleep, as
others; but let us watch and be sober.

verses.plain: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

tokens.t: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

verses.plain: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

tokens.t: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

verses.plain: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

tokens.t: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.plain: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

tokens.t: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

verses.plain: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

tokens.t: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

verses.plain: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

tokens.t: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

verses.plain: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.

tokens.t: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake.
be at peace among yourselves.

verses.plain: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

tokens.t: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all

verses.plain: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.

tokens.t: See that none render evil for evil unto any
; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all

verses.plain: Rejoice evermore.

tokens.t: Rejoice evermore.

verses.plain: Pray without ceasing.

tokens.t: Pray without ceasing.

verses.plain: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

tokens.t: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

verses.plain: Quench not the Spirit.

tokens.t: Quench not the Spirit.

verses.plain: Despise not prophesyings.

tokens.t: Despise not prophesyings.

verses.plain: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

tokens.t: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

verses.plain: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

tokens.t: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

verses.plain: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

tokens.t: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and
your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.plain: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.

tokens.t: Faithful
he that calleth you, who also will do

verses.plain: Brethren, pray for us.

tokens.t: Brethren, pray for us.

verses.plain: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.

tokens.t: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.

verses.plain: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.

tokens.t: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.

verses.plain: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.

tokens.t: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ
with you. Amen.
